name: Overlook: Local multiplayer game - up to 16 players
name_original: Overlook: Local multiplayer game - up to 16 players
description:
Overlook: Party Game
Overlook is a party game for up to 16 players using 8 gamepads! Players split into two teams. You can play as an infected robot, where your goal is to infect as many robots as you can, or you can play as an overseer to seek and find infected robots.










We will be adding more mods to a game. You can send us ideas and vote for existing once on Overlook website. Here are some of recent ideas:


Defective robots applies infected pills for other robots. After few seconds pill deactivate infected robot. There is no “fog of war” in this mode and this came with some good and bad news for both teams!


Infected robots automatically infecting others robots! Be careful – they can infect you back! Try to stay alive until all other robots are infected!


Overseers’s pointer blocks movement of a casual robots. Try to avoid detection by “playing dead” when they move across you!

Defective robots need to pick up all alkaline batteries laying on the map. Overseer can detect if battery is picked using revealing area of their pointers.
